abstract: The AT&T Unity package will allow cellular customers to call any AT&T landline customer without incurring additional usage fees.
snippet: The AT&T Unity package will allow cellular customers to call any AT&T landline customer without incurring additional usage fees.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Jan. 18 — Only weeks after closing its deal for BellSouth, AT&T is embarking on an ambitious strategy to show customers the benefit of its owning 100 million phone lines.

headline.main: AT&T Plans ‘Unity’ Strategy for Free Calls
headline.print_headline: AT&T Plans ‘Unity’ Strategy for Free Calls
